statements: SELECT user_id, graphics_quality FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_game_id = 10;
SELECT user_id, audio_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE audio_settings = 'high';
SELECT user_id, audio_settings, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE control_scheme = 'joystick' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE control_scheme IN ('keyboard', 'joystick') ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, vr_game_id, graphics_quality FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_game_id = 3;
SELECT user_id, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE graphics_quality = 'High' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT vr_game_id, audio_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id > 2 AND control_scheme = 'Advanced' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE audio_settings IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences;
SELECT user_id, game_id, vr_level FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_level > 5;
SELECT game_name, developers, release_date FROM game_settings WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE control_scheme = 'Joystick';
SELECT user_id, game_id, vr_level, graphics_quality FROM user_preferences WHERE game_id = 'ae75d236-ca47-4df9-92f0-4db5af4813fb';
SELECT user_id, game_id, vr_level, graphics_quality, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, game_id, vr_level, graphics_quality, control_scheme FROM user_preferences WHERE vr_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM game_settings ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT game_id, game_name, developers FROM game_settings WHERE supported_vr_devices = 'Oculus Rift';
SELECT user_id, game_id, control_scheme FROM user_preferences ORDER BY control_scheme ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT vr_game_id, graphics_quality FROM user_preferences ORDER BY graphics_quality ASC;
SELECT user_id, age, favorite_genre FROM user_profiles WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM game_settings WHERE developer = 'Unity';
SELECT user_id, username, age, favorite_genre FROM user_profiles WHERE age < 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_preferences WHERE graphics_quality = 'High' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, graphics_quality FROM user_preferences WHERE sound_volume > 50 ORDER BY graphics_quality ASC;

SELECT user_preferences.user_id, user_profiles.username, game_settings.game_name FROM user_preferences INNER JOIN user_profiles ON user_preferences.user_id = user_profiles.user_id INNER JOIN game_settings ON user_preferences.vr_game_id = game_settings.vr_game_id WHERE user_profiles.age < 30;

SELECT user_profiles.username, user_profiles.favorite_genre, game_settings.developer FROM user_profiles JOIN user_preferences ON user_profiles.user_id = user_preferences.user_id JOIN game_settings ON user_preferences.vr_game_id = game_settings.vr_game_id WHERE user_profiles.favorite_genre LIKE '%Action%' ORDER BY game_settings.developer;
SELECT game_name, developer FROM game_settings WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT user_id, experience_level FROM user_profile WHERE age > 25;
SELECT * FROM game_preferences ORDER BY pref_id DESC;
SELECT game_title, sound_settings FROM game_preferences WHERE pref_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT username, age, gender FROM user_profile ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_title, graphic_settings FROM game_preferences WHERE graphic_settings = 'High';
SELECT user_id, game_title, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, game_title, current_level FROM game_progress WHERE game_title LIKE '%Adventure%' ORDER BY current_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT game_name, publisher, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, display_name, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE display_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, game_id, rating FROM user_ratings WHERE rating >= 4.5;
SELECT user_id, game_id, graphic_settings, sound_settings FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM users WHERE registration_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT game_name, publisher, release_date FROM games ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT display_name, avatar_url, bio FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 2
SELECT user_id, game_id, rating, review FROM user_ratings WHERE rating > 4
